select pd_id as id, c_id as cId, pd_name as name, pd_price as price, pd_description as description, pd_quantity as quantity, pd_wholesale as wholesale, pd_dcRate as dcRate, pd_is_maintain as isMaintain, pd_retention_period as retetionDate from MORANMORAN.PRODUCT where pd_id = #{id}
